Yeah sorry folks I only captured speeches onward. I would have liked all of it as I realised later how good the Indians had made the ceremony. I wonder how good the closing will be.

I hope Indians get behind the sports events and turn up.  The seats are empty for the qualifications.  The Indian gov should send schools for free take sides, later doing lessons on the player nations, etc.

Yeah Porkster we shock the world...
I think this ceremony is the best ceremony ever produced in any sports event.
Well....all school are off because of CWG 2010 from 1-17 oct..So it will be dificult to send school kids to join games.....anyway thanks for your review's and for replying

dnerikar ok thanks.  I am also very impressed with the facilities and the event.

The previous post was a bit stuffed up in the sentence.  What I emant was that school children should eb asked to take sides and then review the teams they support in school projects, etc.  they should have thought of this before the games started.  It should have been the games for the children of India.  That would have been a major promotion as parents would then get involved.

What you are saying is absolutely correct but traffic is a huge concern here that is why schools and government offices are closed for two weeks...and people of delhi are frustrated with those early overly exaggerated setback shown by greedy indian and international media, especially by indian  media always hungry for trp's...So people need time to digest those incidences and to support games..
